mapper.select: SELECT course.*, cu.archived, homework.title AS recentWorkTitle, su.username AS createTeacher, su.avatar AS teacherAvatar FROM course LEFT JOIN course_user cu ON cu.course_id = course.id LEFT JOIN homework ON homework.id = course.recent_work LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON su.id = course.create_teacher_id WHERE cu.user_id = #{id}
